name: scale-r
desc: Certain types of charts, such as gauge charts, do not use "scale-x":{} or "scale-y":{} objects.  Instead, "scale-r":{} should be used to customize the scales of these charts.

attrs.name: aperture
attrs.desc: On a gauge chart, the "aperture":{} attribute is used to narrow or widen the visible angle of the gauge.  By default, this is set to 180, which displays a half circle.

attrs.name: center
attrs.desc: On a gauge chart, the "center":{} object is used to style the point at which the gauge pivots.

attrs.name: ring
attrs.desc: On a gauge chart, the "ring":{} object is used to style the ring that appears around the outside edge of the gauge.
